ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: This! Whereas for the profligate there is an evil Homecoming:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: This (for the virtuous); but for the transgressors the evil destination,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: All this (is for the God-fearing). But for the transgressors, an evil resort awaits them --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: However, the rebellious ones will have the worst place to return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: This is for the virtuous; and indeed for the rebellious is a wretched destination.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: This is so! And for the Taghin will be an evil final return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: This (shall be so); and most surely there is an evil resort for the inordinate ones;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: All this; but for the insolent awaits an ill resort,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: This (is for the righteous). And lo! for the transgressors there with be an evil journey's end,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: But the arrogant will have the worst return:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: This: and verily for the exorbitant there shall be an evil retreat:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: This [will be for the righteous], and as for the rebellious there will surely be a bad destination:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Yea, such! but - for the wrong-doers will be an evil place of (Final) Return!-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: This is so! And for the Taghun (transgressors, disobedient to Allah and His Messenger - disbelievers in the Oneness of Allah, criminals, etc.), will be an evil final return (Fire),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: All of this; but, for the proud there is an ill return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: All This. But the transgressors will have a miserable return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: This [is so]. But indeed, for the transgressors is an evil place of return -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [38:55] That, which is mentioned, will be [the reward] for the believers [is so]; but for the insolent (this is a new sentence) there will surely be an evil [place of] return —
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (This) is for the believers. (And lo! for the transgressors) for the disbelievers: Abu Jahl and his host (there will be an evil journey's end) an evil return in the Hereafter,
